00032 class tx_mailformplusplus_wizicon {
00033         
00041         function proc($wizardItems)     {
00042                 global $LANG;
00043 
00044                 $LL = $this->includeLocalLang();
00045 
00046                 $wizardItems['plugins_tx_mailformplusplus_pi1'] = array(
00047                         'icon'        => t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/Images/ce_wiz_pi1.png',
00048                         'title'       => $LANG->getLLL('wizard_pi1.title',$LL),
00049                         'description' => $LANG->getLLL('tt_content.pi1_plus_wiz_description',$LL),
00050                         'params'      => '&defVals[tt_content][CType]=list&defVals[tt_content][list_type]=mailformplusplus_pi1'
00051                 );
00052                 
00053                 $wizardItems['plugins_tx_mailformplusplus_pi2'] = array(
00054                         'icon'        => t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/Images/ce_wiz_pi2.png',
00055                         'title'       => $LANG->getLLL('wizard_pi2.title',$LL),
00056                         'description' => $LANG->getLLL('tt_content.pi2_plus_wiz_description',$LL),
00057                         'params'      => '&defVals[tt_content][CType]=list&defVals[tt_content][list_type]=mailformplusplus_pi2'
00058                 );
00059 
00060                 return $wizardItems;
00061         }
00062         
00068         function includeLocalLang()     {
00069                 $llFile     = t3lib_extMgm::extPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/Language/locallang_db.xml';
00070                 $LOCAL_LANG = t3lib_div::readLLXMLfile($llFile, $GLOBALS['LANG']->lang);
00071                 
00072                 return $LOCAL_LANG;
00073         }
00074 }
